revised_title: Observations and Findings from the 1896 Total Solar Eclipse in Novaya Zemlya
tldr: The authors describe the circumstances and arrangements for an expedition to observe the 1896 total solar eclipse in Novaya Zemlya. They detail the observing station, instrument setup, and work plan. The valuable spectroscopic results are still being analyzed, but the coronagraph results and photographs are reported. Meteorological and other conditions during the eclipse are also recorded.
